subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: As Nascar heads into Sunday’s season-opening Daytona 500, the question facing the sport is whether Hendrick Motorsports’ dominance has led to a competitive imbalance.
snippet: As Nascar heads into Sunday’s season-opening Daytona 500, the question facing the sport is whether Hendrick Motorsports’ dominance has led to a competitive imbalance.
